name: Spacial Invasion
description:
Spacial Invasion is a new and modern take on the classic game Space Invaders. Spacial Invasion offers a unique experience to players, with an in-depth skill tree, extremely customisable game options, a plethora of ships to choose from, and exciting power ups that can boost a players performance.

While Spacial Invasion is currently in the Alpha stage of development, updates are being released regularly, with new content releases being developed on a fortnightly schedule. There is still a massive amount of content that can, and will be added to Spacial Invasion, so these updates will continue for some while.

While I do have some outline of the direction that I hope the Spacial Invasion development will take, I am open to any community suggestions, and welcome users to submit their ideas through e-mail or the discussion board.

I hope that you enjoy playing Spacial Invasion, and that you will continue to support me during the creation of this game.

-- Liam
